ISSUE.TITLE: Status - Unable to display status output on Windows source and binary build
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** While testing TWAP on the staging branch (dev-0.44.0), the bot was able to create/cancel orders according to config however when checking the `status` it returns an error of `Unhandled error in background task: Python int too large to convert to C long` ``` 2021-09-30 15:54:09,423 - 15660 - hummingbot.core.utils.async_utils - ERROR - Unhandled error in background task: Python int too large to convert to C long Traceback (most recent call last): File "C:\Users\Ralph\github\staging\hummingbot\core\utils\async_utils.py", line 9, in safe_wrapper return await c File "C:\Users\Ralph\github\staging\hummingbot\client\command\status_command.py", line 137, in status_check_all self._notify(await self.strategy_status()) File "C:\Users\Ralph\github\staging\hummingbot\client\command\status_command.py", line 81, in strategy_status st_status = self.strategy.format_status() File "C:\Users\Ralph\github\staging\hummingbot\strategy\twap\twap.py", line 168, in format_status df = LimitOrder.to_pandas(active_orders) File "hummingbot\\core\\data_type\\limit_order.pyx", line 43, in hummingbot.core.data_type.limit_order.LimitOrder.to_pandas long now_timestamp = int(time.time() * 1e6) if end_time_order_age == 0 else end_time_order_age OverflowError: Python int too large to convert to C long ``` Tried to reinstall and change the rate_oracle_source and global_token (from USD to USDT) but still getting the same error. The issue does not happen on Windows docker and Mac's src/docker build. **Steps To Reproduce** 1. Create TWAP strategy 1. Disable `is_time_span_execution` (optional if you want to enable it) 1. Wait for the bot to create orders and crosscheck them on the connector 1. Once you are sure that orders match, run the status command **Screenshots** Windows binary ![status not working](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73840223/135417155-def0bdf5-24a6-4a21-bff4-8139da3888e2.PNG) Windows source build ![status not working](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/73840223/135417300-1bc28878-7ddf-493c-9a66-bb95d11334bb.PNG) **Release version** dev-0.44.0 **Attachments** [twap.zip](https://github.com/CoinAlpha/hummingbot/files/7258018/twap.zip) _WARNING: Do NOT publish any exchange API keys or your wallet's private key. Whoever has access to them may steal your assets!_ **Optional: your discord username:** â”†Issue is synchronized with this [Clickup task](https://app.clickup.com/t/1ran86w) by [Unito](https://www.unito.io)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #5141 from CoinAlpha/fix/order_tracker_not_match_orders_with_undefined_ids_from_development fix/order tracker not match orders with undefined ids
